data.message: Man he is my favorite rapper no doubt but I think I like who he used to be as opposed to who he is now. I understand a.transformation and there is no denying the skill and wordplay but if this is a taste of the new album then im disappointed.

replies.message: I think this is more of to keep us occupied while he finishes the album. Em is a very unpredictable man, trust me he'll release something great.
rodney, clearly you dont appreciate great lyriscism. This is some real rap, he is the greatest of all time

Pierre Lindstam I think he is the greatest of all time. Thats why I hold him to a higher standard. This is not his best work. I could listen to his old music all day every day. This I struggled to make it through. He made his stuff way too complex
